name: Paragon Airheater Technologies
overview: Paragon Airheater Technologies, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of seals and related replacement parts for rotary regenerative air heaters/preheaters for power generation companies in the United States and internationally. It provides radial/axial and circumferential/bypass seals, enamel coatings, basketed elements/baskets, and hopper level detectors for air heaters; and replacement parts, such as diaphragm stay splitter plates, pin racks, shell plates and covers, gratings, t-bar assemblies, rotor modules, element tighteners, access doors, and sealing surface liners. The company also offers bearings, seal tabs, reinforcing gussets, basket access cover plates, rotor angles, bypass seal support angles, circumferential seal mounting angles and rings, stay plates, axial seal plate assemblies, radial sector plate assemblies and adjusters, custom fabricated components, basket shims and seal strips, holding strips, and fasteners. In addition, it provides technical support services, including inspection, installation, performance assessment, parts replacement, and upgrade, as well as involves in maintenance service programs. Paragon Airheater Technologies, Inc. serves customers through representative sales firms. The company was formerly known as Power Replacement Inc. and changed its name in April 2005. Paragon Airheater Technologies, Inc. was founded in 1967 and is based in Corona, California. It has manufacturing plants in Pennsylvania and Mexico.

funding_rounds.source_description: SAIL Invests In Clean-Tech Co. Paragon Airheater
